title: Reduce code duplication in role-specific components
description: Multiple role-based dashboard components (TenantDashboard, OwnerDashboard, AgentDashboard, etc.) have similar patterns. Refactor to create reusable base components and shared utilities.

title: Expand unit test coverage
description: Current testing setup includes integration tests for key workflows, but unit test coverage could be expanded for individual services, hooks, and components. Focus on: storage.ts, messages.ts, conversations.ts, auth.ts, and payment processing logic.

title: Add error boundary improvements
description: Enhance the global error boundary (ErrorBoundary.tsx) with better error reporting, user-friendly error messages in Portuguese, and integration with monitoring/logging system for production error tracking.
close_reason: Enhanced error boundary with error categorization, better Portuguese messages, and comprehensive logging

title: Optimize bundle size
description: Project has 443 node_modules packages. Analyze bundle size and identify opportunities for: tree-shaking, lazy loading routes/components, removing unused dependencies, and code splitting. Target: reduce initial bundle size by at least 20%.

title: Document API endpoints and Cloud Functions
description: Create comprehensive documentation for: Stripe webhook handlers, scheduled payment functions, callable Cloud Functions (createPaymentIntent, createSetupIntent, etc.), and their integration with the frontend. Include request/response formats, error codes, and usage examples.

title: Implement role-based Firestore security rules
description: Current Firestore rules are too permissive (any authenticated user can read/write). Need to implement proper role-based access control for all collections: users, properties, leases, payments, maintenance, conversations, messages, applications, documents, vendors, notifications.
close_reason: Implemented comprehensive role-based security rules for all Firestore collections with documentation
